issue.title: Will drcsim debs be released for gazebo5?

content.raw:
I've been testing the option to release from default branch using gazebo5 and seems possible.

A couple of questions, @scpeters, @hsu:

 * Do we want to reuse the drcsim package name or build a new one (like drcsim5) to keep the old one working?
 * I've seen a 5.1.1 prerelease and default branch seems to be ABI compatible with the latest 5.0.0 release. 5.2.0 for the new version? 

Thanks.
content.html:
I've been testing the option to release from default branch using gazebo5 and seems possible.

A couple of questions, @scpeters, @hsu:

  • Do we want to reuse the drcsim package name or build a new one (like drcsim5) to keep the old one working?
  • I've seen a 5.1.1 prerelease and default branch seems to be ABI compatible with the latest 5.0.0 release. 5.2.0 for the new version?

Thanks.
